overview: After a vigorous early morning “workout”, Tracy senses trouble in her marriage with husband Mark and looks forward to a visit from her college roommate, Roxie. Feeling lost and rejected, Tracy discovers, with the help of randy Roxie, that even though her connubial bliss might be coming apart, it’s always more fun Coming Together.  Tempted by Roxie’s Jacuzzi antics with a horny hunk, Tracy’s hopes for a reconciliation with Mark keep her out of hot water – for a while. But when she discovers her husband’s weekend hunting trip is a ruse for a little shotgun practice on his mistress, the two women decide some stud-stalking is in order.
title: Surf, Sand & Sex
